front.sentence: and your families. Why? Because of some stupid fucking b***h that we can put a bed right here.

back.phonetic: ənd jʊr ˈfæməliz waɪ bɪˈkəz əv səm ˈstupɪd ˈfəkɪŋ bi eɪʧ ðət wi kən pʊt ə bɛd raɪt hir

sentence: and your families. Why? Because of some stupid fucking b***h that we can put a bed right here.
